name: New Atomic
body:
### Hey there,
The description says it all. This is a Joomla template that has responsiveness built into it using the Foundation CSS framework.
When you unzip a Joomla 1.7 download, there is a default template "atomic". We have built on top of this template as a way to show that responsiveness can also be used for your websites.

### Screenshot
![Screenshot](https://github.com/meridiansoftech/joomla_foundation_template/raw/master/new_atomic/template_preview.png)

### How to Install
* -Download the repo.
* -Unzip the repo into /your_joomla_site/templates/
* -Make sure the template files are at /your_joomla_site/templates/new_atomic/
* -Login to the Administration of your joomla site
* -Click "Extensions > Extension Manager"
* -Click the "Discover" link, then click "Purge Cache".
* -Click the "Discover" button.
* -You will see the newly added template "new_atomic" in the list.
* -Finally, click "Install".

## There, all done!
tagline: A responsive Joomla 1.7 template built with Foundation and HTML5
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
